entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Temiscouata
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
